appDescription.message: Chrome Extension who allow you to easely follow when your streamers goes live.

checkOffline.message: Check this if you want to see the offline channels

CheckOnLaunch.message: Check this if you want to be notify about the streamers you are online when you launch Chrome

placeholderUrlChannel.message: Name of the channel (in the URL)

alertMultiTwitchApp.message: No channel selected and you're not on twitch

AppNotInstalled.message: You need to install the Multi Twitch App to be able to use this option. Do you want to go to the Web Store page ?

lupusNote.message:
Hi, this is Lupusanghren ! I'm the developer of this extension. I think I finished developing and now I'm asking you to help me improve the extension a little bit more.
To do so, tweet me @Lupusanghrenn or throught the Chrome Web Store (where you download the extension). I'm also looking for an artist to help me improve the design !

NoChannelSelected.message: No channel selected ! (Select channels using the checkboxs)
